SEARCH
Module org.postgresql.pljava.internal
Package org.postgresql.pljava.pg.adt

Interface DateTimeAdapter.JSR310

All Superinterfaces:
SlotTester.Visible
Enclosing class:
DateTimeAdapter
public static interface DateTimeAdapter.JSR310 extends SlotTester.Visible
Instances of the date/time/timestamp adapters using the JSR310 java.time types.

A holder interface so these won't be instantiated unless wanted.
